channel.title: Missclick Trollbox
channel.description:
Hello, this is my first post here. :slight_smile:
I have noticed when I play Fool that if I missclick the trollbox ability when nobody can't speak, you lose the ability that day. That happened to me a couple of times. maybe I am a bit dumb :smile:
I would like that this could be improved.
Thank you for your amazing game.
